id.description: Definition of an identifier in the CURIE `prefix:local-part` format which is the default type of e.g. ontology term `id` values (used e.g. for filters or external identifiers).

label.description: The text that describes the term. By default it could be the preferred text of the term, but is it acceptable to customize it for a clearer description and understanding of the term in an specific context.

title: Ontology Term
$comment: The ontologies will need normalizing from their side. The ontology to be used is EUCAIM HyperOntology, found at https://hyperontology.eucaim.cancerimage.eu
